name: Torque Offroad
description:
The most realistic off road vehicle physics and the high quality ghraphic, it's an offroad driving simulator with addictive and fun gameplay. Build and customize your rigs and explore the open world. With the ultimate Workshop system, you can personalize and tune your vehicle in real-time, creating countless of combinations. Change suspension, tires, rims, choose traction mode ex 2wd or 4wd, choose diff mode ex lock all differentials or select a single , and many many other customizations and tunes. Build your personalized vehicle as you want, from a 4x4 generic all-terrain to a monster truck or a rock crawler or a mud truck, the limit is your imagination.
Take the wheel of your customized vehicle and drive on the beautiful rugged terrain.
